title: Looking to pick up a B18 Jackson
author: JollyRoger

posts.post_title: Looking to pick up a B18 Jackson
posts.post_content:
Many collectors overlook this set, but I love it. Been picking up a few of the key players lately, and I'd like to add a Jackson to my collection. Either color would suffice. PM or email me at [url]feeshuntin@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks for looking and happy collecting! 
                               -marshall

While it's a ways off,(Sept/Oct) we will have one in our next B-L Auction, the Purple Pennant's version.

Scott

[quote name="sb1" post=1418412]While it's a ways off,(Sept/Oct) we will have one in our next B-L Auction, the Purple Pennant's version.

Scott[/QUOTE]

Nice. Picked up Stengel and Max Carey from you guys recently and was very pleased!
